programme.title: The Awakeners
programme.desc: (S01EP01) Indigenous singer Laura Vinson shares her heart and personal queries that led her on a quest to find Indigenous artists who are disabled.

programme.title: Kelly & Ramya
programme.desc: Kelly MacDonald, Ramya Amuthan and a team of blind and partially sighted contributors share arts, entertainment and lifestyle stories.

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S07EP18) Julia Ogden uncovers an unexpected truth behind her father's death - and his life. Meanwhile, Brackenreid must take over for Murdoch in the investigation of a murder amongst a group of geniuses.
Année : 2008
Avec : Yannick Bisson (Detective William Murdoch) Hélène Joy (Dr. Julia Ogden) Thomas Craig (Inspector Brackenreid) Jonny Harris (Constable Crabtree) Georgina Reilly (Dr. Emily Grace) Lachlan Murdoch (Constable Henry Higgins) Rainbow Sun Francks (Sam Carr) Steven Yaffee (Arthur Elliot)

programme.title: Ça me regarde
programme.desc:
(S09EP35) Aujourd'hui, on plonge dans la production théâtrale Soeurs Sirène, qui met en vedette un personnage handicapé. Et nous débutons l'émission avec la découverte d'un concept qui place les patients au coeur des recherches sur les maladies chroniques.
Année : 2008

programme.title: #IGotThis
programme.desc:
(S03EP01) In this episode of #IGotThis... adjusting your attitude. A fencing coach, with limited mobility, and his young student, who has cerebral palsy, realize being different doesn't mean being less.
Année : 2008

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:
(S03EP01) Part 1. Hope Valley seems destined for big changes as Elizabeth looks after Jack's dog and Abigail tries to get to the bottom of thefts from her kitchen.
Année : 2014

programme.title: You Can't Ask That
programme.desc:
Often misunderstood, Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder can affect anyone who has experienced trauma. Survivors tell their stories and dispel myths.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Les quatre sens
programme.desc:
(S04EP03) Interior designer Kimberley Seldon joins Christine and Carl in the kitchen to enjoy smoked and salted foods.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:
(S06EP07) We highlight the National accessArts Centre, Canada's oldest and largest disability arts organization. Follow the stories of member artists' struggles and difficulties, and how the NaAC has helped facilitate success.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Eyesoforst-l Job
programme.desc:
(S04EP03) Chris Judge and his team spearhead a backyard transformation for Jennifer and Scott, including a cob oven perfect for pizza, bread-making, and all sorts of possibilities to feed the community's body and soul.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S06EP05) Murdoch investigates a murder at a nudist community.
Année : 2008

programme.title: NOW with Dave Brown
programme.desc:
Join Dave Brown as he discusses the latest news, sports, entertainment and current events through a disability lens.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Dillon's life was altered at just eighteen when he was diagnosed with Friedreich's Ataxia, a rare genetic disease. Walking is difficult, and his speech is impaired - but Dillon has taken his disability as an opportunity to try new activities.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
(S18EP15) Josh Davies is a stand-up comedian trying to turn making people laugh into a full time living. It's not an easy path, but being Blind gives Josh a unique perspective.
Année : 2011

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:
